BotCommand.name: random
BotCommand.HelpText: Displays the status of random responses.

BotCommand.name: on
BotCommand.HelpText: Enables random responses.

BotCommand.name: off
BotCommand.HelpText: Disables random responses.

BotCommand.name: mode
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random mode Displays the current quote generation/selection mode. Syntax: random mode <u>mode<u> Changes the mode. Requires BotOp access.

BotCommand.name: list
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random list Displays the current quote list. Syntax: random list <u>list<u> Changes the list. Requires BotOp access.

BotCommand.name: prob
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random prob Displays the current probability of random responses. Syntax: random prob <u>probability<u> Changes the probability. Requires Admin access.

BotCommand.name: timer
BotCommand.HelpText: Displays the state of the random quote timer.

BotCommand.name: on
BotCommand.HelpText: Starts the random quote timer.

BotCommand.name: off
BotCommand.HelpText: Stops the random quote timer.

BotCommand.name: time
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random time Displays the current maximum interval between random responses. Syntax: random time <u>TimeSpan<u> Sets the maximum time between responses. Requires Admin access.

BotCommand.name: find
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random find <u>pattern<u> Searches for quotes that match the given <u>pattern<u>.

BotCommand.name: quote
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random quote Displays a random quote from the loaded lists. Syntax: random quote <u>number<u> Displays the quote with the specified <u>number<u>. Specify <u>last<u> to display the previously selected quote.

BotCommand.name: markov
BotCommand.HelpText: Generates a line of text using a Markov chain.

BotCommand.name: level
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random markov level Displays the markov level. Syntax: random markov level <u>level<u> Sets the markov level. Requires BotOp access.

BotCommand.name: quote+
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random quote+ <u>message<u> Displays a random quote that contains one of the words in <u>message<u>.

BotCommand.name: quote++
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random quote++ <u>message<u> Displays a quote that contains the most words in <u>message<u>.

BotCommand.name: quote-
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random quote- <u>message<u> Displays a random quote that does not contain one of the words in <u>message<u>.

BotCommand.name: quote--
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: random quote-- <u>message<u> Displays a quote that contains the least words in <u>message<u>.

BotCommand.name: quotes
BotCommand.HelpText: Displays the number of quotes currently loaded.

BotCommand.name: kick
BotCommand.HelpText: Kicks a random user from the channel. This command will fail if either you or the bot do not have access to kick anyone in the channel.
